sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_STND_DEGR', 3, '개정차수 ', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_PROC_SEQ0', 4, '공정SEQ', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '100', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEMPK', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_PROC_GUBN', 5, '공정구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_KIND_CODE', 6, 'PCB종류', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_JUMP_YN', 7, 'JUMP인쇄', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_TOPP_GROP', 8, 'TOP그룹', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_BOTT_GROP', 9, 'BOTTOM그룹', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '140', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_PROC_NAME', 10, '가공명', 'VARCHAR', '50', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_NET0_CYTM', 11, 'NET CT', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '120', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_NET0_COEF1', 12, 'NET CT 계수1', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '200', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_NET0_COEF2', 13, 'NET CT 계수2', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '200', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_NET0_COEF3', 14, 'NET CT 계수3', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '200', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_CAVT', 15, 'CVT', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_PREP_HOUR', 16, '준비시간', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_PRSN_CNT0', 17, '인원1', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_MCHH_CODE', 18, '기계장비코드', 'VARCHAR', '20', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_APPL_GUBN', 19, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_REMK', 20, 'REMARK', 'VARCHAR', '200', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_UPDT_CMAN', 21, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_UPDT_DATE', 22, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_INIT_CMAN', 23, '작성자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBP', 'PCBP_INIT_DATE', 24, '작성일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:02', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBPCBP ( PCBP_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,PCBP_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,PCBP_STND_DEGR VARCHAR2(10) ,PCBP_PROC_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBP_PROC_GUBN VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBP_KIND_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBP_JUMP_YN VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBP_TOPP_GROP VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBP_BOTT_GROP VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBP_PROC_NAME VARCHAR2(50) ,PCBP_NET0_CYTM NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBP_NET0_COEF1 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PCBP_NET0_COEF2 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PCBP_NET0_COEF3 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PCBP_CAVT NUMBER(10, 0) ,PCBP_PREP_HOUR NUMBER(7, 2) ,PCBP_PRSN_CNT0 NUMBER(7, 2) ,PCBP_MCHH_CODE VARCHAR2(20) ,PCBP_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,PCBP_REMK VARCHAR2(200) ,PCBP_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBP_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBP_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBP_INIT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBPCBP_PK PRIMARY KEY( PCBP_CORP_CODE ,PCBP_STND_GUBN ,PCBP_STND_DEGR ,PCBP_PROC_SEQ0 ,PCBP_PROC_GUBN ) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
